entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
